site_name: SAP Cloud for Customer Server-Side Integration (SSI)
text_content:
"Forbidden" Error after Key User Deletion
[ This article is work-in-progress ]
Symptoms
Key User navigates to Users tab and deletes himself
An error is displayed "Forbidden - GET https://%tenantid%-0crm-0ondemand-0com.c4c.invisiblesolutions.com/api/users This page or action is forbidden"
 
 
 
After opening Groupware Settings page Key User appears again in user's list
Causes
This is an expected behavior, as long as Key User (Administrator) has deleted himself, he can no longer access pages in groupware settings. As soon as user re-opens the Groupware Settings page, Key User will be provisioned again.
Resolution
Key Users planned to be disabled (deleted) must not open Groupware Settings anymore. Such users will no longer be provisioned
Do not delete Key Users from the Users tab, leave them "as is"
Restrict access rights for such users in SAP Cloud for Customer, so they don't have access to Groupware Settings and Key User permissions
